item.description:
Hey ladies!

Thanks for the suggestions and using the message boards. Love having input from the group, for sure! It looks like this place can take reservations- well, depending on the number of guests and time of day. I figured Thursday would be our best best in order to make sure we can secure some seating:-) For those who attended the last event at Loco- you know exactly what I am referring to:-) I figured 7:30 would be good time for some cocktails and apps while allowing everyone to get home from work and do what they need to do before heading out again.

Looking forward to seeing everyone, and hopefully the weather will be 'happier' by then!!!

Lisa
item.name: By popular demand......The Yard House!!!!!!
